Package backend.tradesystem.admin_managers

Class HandleFrozenManager

java.lang.Object
backend.tradesystem.Manager
backend.tradesystem.admin_managers.HandleFrozenManager
public class HandleFrozenManager
extends Manager
Handles anything relating to freezing a user
